title: Stand Mixer Spiralizer Attachment | KitchenAid
description: Introducing the new Spiralizer attachment for your KitchenAid Stand Mixer. With the power to spiralize, peel, core and slice fruits and vegetables, you can get creative with your favorite dishes. Its five blades allow for nine different types of spiralizing, slicing, coring and peeling. So whether you’re trying a new trend or putting a spin on a classic, every creation is sure to dazzle.

asset.author: KitchenAid

transcripts: The KitchenAid spiralizer with peel, core, slice. Inspiring delight and creativity. For a classic and trending dishes. Five blades, nine culinary options which means unlimited opportunities to spin new creations in your kitchen. From KitchenAid.
